snippet.title: 7HE CODE - Gameplay (ios, ipad) (ENG)
snippet.description:
7HE CODE

AppStore: https://goo.gl/Iehsvl
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Кэшбек с покупок: http://gestyy.com/erZyld
Ссылка на канал:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnBzbs9QwA5bo2FkKVB-LLA
Добавляйтесь в друзья вконтакте:
http://vk.com/mr.portatronik
Подписывайтесь в Instagram:
https://instagram.com/portatronika/
Подписывайтесь Twitter :
https://twitter.com/portatronik
Для помощи каналу :
Яндекс кошелек : 4100 1386 1970 120
WebMoney :R468406472292
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7HE CODE
От maystorm games

Описание
Stuck in a room? - drop us a line(office@maystorm.at) or search for walk-throughs!
**************************************
Lost in E.N.I.G.M.A - a trainingssimulation for prospective space-marines - we're testing your mental fitness.
The only way out of E.N.I.G.M.A is to pass all the rooms, but beware - you'll need to find a 3 digit code and a hidden symbol in every room to move on.

Are you smart enough to master all the rooms? Got a little (Space-)Captain in you?

Train your eyes and your logical reasoning! The puzzles will get harder and harder.

"THE CODE" - Main features:
*****************
* 18 unique rooms and puzzles
* 3-star highscore system
* Captivating story
* Full 3D environment


How to play?
************
* In every room is a hidden 3 digit-code and symbol
* Use the console to open the door
* To solve the puzzles, think outside the box

Играем на ipad pro 9.7
